## Calendar 2024 Winter

- In-Class Assessments (ICA's); 12 total; 24% of final mark; 2% each.
- All In-Class Assessments (ICA's) are due on Sunday of the week at 11:59 PM.
- Labs; 5 total; 10% of final mark; 2% each.
- All Labs are due on Sunday of the week at 11:59 PM.
- Practical Assessments (PA's); 3 total; 66% of final mark; 22% each.
- All Practical Assessments (PA's) are done during class time.
- All Assessments are to be uploaded (pushed) to your github workbook repo.
